name: Aromatic
description: High kilned malt. Adds color, malty flavors and aromas.

name: Biscuit
description: A lightly roasted malt. Imparts a biscuity flavor and aroma, and a light brown color.

name: Carmel Wheat
description: Carmel malt produced from wheat. Imparts carmel character, improves head retention.

name: Chocolate Malt
description: Kilned at a high temperature to a chocolate color. Imparts a nutty toasted aroma and flavor, and a chocolate color.

name: Coffee Malt
description: Kilned at a high temperature to a coffee color. Imparts a coffee-like character and color.

name: Flaked Barley
description: Unmalted barley processed through hot rollers. Imparts grainy flavor, improves head retention.

name: Honey Malt
description: Kilned to produce a malt that imparts a sweet honey-like character.

name: Munich Malt
description: High kilned malt. Imparts malty aromas, flavors, and light copper color.

name: Pale Two Row Malt
description: Base malt suitable for all beer style. Provides fermentable sugars, light malt color, flavor and aroma.

name: Roasted Barley
description: Unmalted barley roasted to a very dark color.

name: Rye Malt
description: Base malt for all rye beers. Imparts a spicy flavor and aroma.

name: Smoked Malt
description: Pale malt that has been smoked with a hardwood. Imparts a smokey flavor and aroma.

name: Vienna Malt
description: High kilned base malt. Not as dark as Munich. Adds color malty flavors and aromas.

name: Wheat Malt
description: Base malt produced from wheat. Used as base for all wheat beer style. Imparts a grainy tart character.
